name: APLX 55
title: Pardon My French: Politeness, Impoliteness, Swearing, Slang, and Humor
description: Explores the history and use of ''bad;'' language, including issues of politeness, impoliteness, swearing, slang, and humor. In readings, lectures and discussions, we examine contexts of language use: who can say what, when, how and under what communicative conditions.
